github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Generate a commit message that MUST follow the Conventional Commits format (feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, test, perf, build, ci, chore, revert). Include a brief description of the change in the subject line (under 72 characters) and a summarized explanation in the body, if necessary. Separate the subject and body with a blank line. Example: 'feat(auth): Add forgot password functionality to the login screen' or 'fix(products): Fix date format in the product list'.
